abilities.name: Sadism (Trait)
abilities.description: Passive: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

abilities.name: Discord Strike
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Vector TargetingCreate a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.

abilities.name: Deadly Charge
abilities.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.*Ability can be channeled indefinitely, but damage and distance will no longer increase after 1.6 seconds

abilities.name: Counter-Strike
abilities.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Avoidance
abilities.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 65 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 65%.

abilities.name: Lightning Fury
abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.Passive: Cassia deals 15% increased damage to Blinded targets.

abilities.name: Fend
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes* Actually deals ticks of 39 damage every 0.125 seconds to a total of 12 ticks over it's duration* Maximum damage with untalented Fend is 468 (+4% per level).

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.* Prioritises enemy heroes and only bounces back to Cassia, if there are no enemy heroes in its bounce range* Ball Lightning going through Cassia counsumes a bounce normally.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

abilities.name: Timewalker
abilities.description: You've traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 2 levels earlier  than your teammates!

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 400 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 480 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: Time Trap
abilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put into Time Stop for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

abilities.name: Slowing Sands
abilities.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Temporal Loop
abilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hammerang
abilities.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to you, dealing 121 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Deal 107 (+4% per level) to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage per second for 4.25 seconds if you remain close to the target.

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+4% per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Mighty Gust
abilities.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Hinterland Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, you can fly a great distance over terrain.

abilities.name: Ogre Rage
abilities.description: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's armor by 25.

abilities.name: Shadowflame
abilities.description: Deal 135 (+5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Dread Orb
abilities.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 119 (+5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Runic Blast
abilities.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 221 (+4% per level) damage around it.

abilities.name: Twisting Nether
abilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Detonate Twisting Nether
abilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
abilities.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 226 (108 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

abilities.name: Eye of Kilrogg
abilities.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.description: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Cyber Agility
abilities.description: Activate to jump to target area

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.Stores up to 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 2 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: X-Strike
abilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

abilities.name: Curse of the Worgen
abilities.description: Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged. While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage and you gain 10 armor, taking 10% less damage.

abilities.name: Razor Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe towards the area in front of you for 349 (166 + 4% per level) damage. Human Form: Gilnean Cocktail

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 518 (246 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen Form: Razor Swipe

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human Form: Darkflight

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 193 (92 + 4% per level) damage. Worgen Form: Disengage

abilities.name: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 651 (355 + 4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

abilities.name: Cursed Bullet
abilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

abilities.name: Life Tap
abilities.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% mana.

abilities.name: Fel Flame
abilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 483 (209 + 4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 377 (179 + 4% per level) Health per second.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 492 (214 + 4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

abilities.name: Horrify
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Destruction
abilities.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage in a small area.

abilities.name: Betrayer's Thirst
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

abilities.name: Dive
abilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage to enemies along the way.HItting an enemy increases your Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 439 (208 + 4% per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

abilities.name: The Hunt
abilities.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.description: Deal 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

abilities.name: Cone of Cold
abilities.description: Deal 504 (204 + 4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 680 (323 + 4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

abilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilities.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 320 (+4% per level) damage in an area.Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 553 (252 + 4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 303 (138 + 4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyroblast
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 2150 (851 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 1075 (426 + 4% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

abilities.name: Phoenix
abilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

abilities.name: Assimilation
abilities.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.Current maximum: 2200 (1045 + 4% per level)

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Leap to a target, dealing 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage. If this kills the target, its cooldown is instantly reset.

abilities.name: Impaling Blades
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

abilities.name: Primal Grasp
abilities.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards you, dealing 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Summon Ultralisk
abilities.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.description: Deals 180 (86 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Critical Mass
abilities.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of your Abilities.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 266 (151 + 3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to structures.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Fire an orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 244 (135 + 3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. The amount of damage dealt is increased the further it travels, up to 732 (405 + 3% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance instantly.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: Wave of Force
abilities.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 425 (168 + 5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Nature's Toxin
abilities.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 71 (34 + 4% per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Blossom
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Crippling Spores
abilities.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Wisp
abilities.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. Lasts 45 seconds.

abilities.name: Relocate Wisp
abilities.description: Orders your Wisp to move to a new location.

abilities.name: Thornwood Vine
abilities.description: Send forth vines that deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

abilities.name: Leaping Strike
abilities.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 594 (286 + 4% per level) damage. Has 2 charges.

abilities.name: Dryad's Swiftness
abilities.description: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.

abilities.name: Reaper's Mark
abilities.description: Basic Attacks afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds. Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 2.25% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 damage and healing Malthael for 44 per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

abilities.name: Wraith Strike
abilities.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

abilities.name: Death Shroud
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

abilities.name: Tormented Souls
abilities.description: Gain 10 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Last Rites
abilities.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.‚ù¢ Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed while under the effect of Last Rites permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Permanent Cloak, Sniper
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Deals 588 (279 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and slow it by 30% for 2.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies. Using this Ability does not break Cloak.

abilities.name: Triple Tap
abilities.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 741 (352 + 4% per level) damage each.

abilities.name: Precision Strike
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 1000 (475 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds. Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.Molten Core: Molten SwingStun and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Molten Swing
abilities.description: Swing your hammer in a wide arc, dealing moderate damage and stunning enemies for 1 second.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Living Meteor
abilities.description: Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 72 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in that target direction dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.Molten Core: Meteor ShowerDrop a line of meteor impacts.

abilities.name: Meteor Shower
abilities.description: Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals moderate damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Blast Wave
abilities.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.Molten Core: Explosive RuneCause a delayed explosion in a large area.

abilities.name: Explosive Rune
abilities.description: Create a rune that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing damage to non-Structure enemies in a circular area.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Sulfuras Smash
abilities.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Lava Wave
abilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Advanced Optics
abilities.description: Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deals 526 (250 + 4% per level) damage and knocks enemies back.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Automatically activates to heal for 965 (458 + 4% per level) when you are below 30% Health.

abilities.name: Hyperion
abilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 1740 (826 + 4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Raynor's Raiders
abilities.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 67.5 (+4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

abilities.name: Advancing Strikes
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 25% of your damage and have 50% of your current Health. Images last up to 18 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack within 10 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: You and your Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 25% and you can pass through other units. Damage taken within the first 1 second will not break Wind Walk.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image.Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of your damage.

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Passive:‚ù¢  Quest: Nearby Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and Heroes drop 5 Fresh Meat when they die. You can pick up Fresh Meat to gain 1 Basic Attack damage per Meat. Can hold up to 125 Meat. You drop up to 10 Fresh Meat upon dying.‚ù¢ Reward: After acquiring 125 pieces of Fresh Meat, gain and additional 100 Basic Attack damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. You also no longer lose Fresh Meat on death.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  Your next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done for 5 seconds. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Last 4 seconds. Your Basic Attacks against a branded Hero increase the duration by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostwolf Resilience
abilities.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 178 (+4% per level) damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 89 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

abilities.name: Windfury
abilities.description: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

abilities.name: Sundering
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: You can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times you need to reload over 0.75 seconds. You can manually reload early by activating Reload.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 557 (265 + 4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when damaging an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 1.5 seconds dealing 1226 (444 + 5.5% per level) damage to them and 613 (222 + 5.5% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

abilities.name: Minigun
abilities.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 1414 (671 + 4% per level) damage to the target and 691 (328 + 4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: Annihilate
abilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 430 (204 + 4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 561 (267 + 4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Ragnarok Missiles
abilities.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Dash in target direction.

abilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

abilities.name: Vanish
abilities.description: Valeera vanishes from sight, becoming Stealthed and increasing her Movement Speed by 10%. For the first second, she is Unrevealable and can pass through other units.Using Vanish grants Valeera an alternate set of Abilities that she can use while Stealthed.

abilities.name: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash foward, hitting all enemies in a line for 114.4 (+4% per level damage). If Sinister Stike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second.Awards 1 Combo Point.Stealth: AmbushHeavily damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Ambush the target, instantly dealing 187.2 (+4% per level) damage to the target.Awards 1 Combo Point.Unstealth: Sinister StrikeDash foward, damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 135.2 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera.Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.Stealth: Cheap ShotStun and damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Cheap Shot
abilities.description: Deal 31.2 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and stun them for 1.25 seconds.Awards 1 Combo Point.Unstealth: Blade FurryDeal damage around Valeera.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Consume all stored Combo Points to Eviscerate an enemy, dealing increased damage per Combo Point spent.1 Point: 85 (+4% per level)2 Points: 208 (+4% per level)1 Point: 312 (+4% per level)Stealth: GarroteSilence and damage an enemy over time.

abilities.name: Garrote
abilities.description: Garrote an enemy, instantly dealing 20 (+4% per level) to the target, as well as a larger amount of bonus damage over 15 seconds, and silencing them for 2.25 seconds.Awards 1 Combo Point.Unstealth: EviscerateHigh damage finishing move.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use Abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

abilities.name: Cloak of Shadows
abilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 second, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability damage taken by 75%.Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

abilities.name: Hatred
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Your next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 132 (63 + 4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 493 (234 + 4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

abilities.name: Heroic Strike
abilities.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 140 (+3.5% per level) bonus spell damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 0.75 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.Passive:Maximum Health increased by 30%.Passive:Gain 15 Armor.

abilities.name: Colossus Smash
abilities.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage.Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%.Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

abilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury
abilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

abilities.name: Permanent Cloak
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling ends Permenent Cloak.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Deal 415 (197 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break cloak.

abilities.name: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Void Prison
abilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 8 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

abilities.name: Twin Cleave
abilities.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 116 damage and slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 25% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

abilities.name: Taz'dingo
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

abilities.name: Guillotine
abilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.This cannot be interrupted, once cast.

abilities.name: Locust Strain
abilities.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities. Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

abilities.name: Stab
abilities.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 119 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.

abilities.name: Spike Burst
abilities.description: Deals 116 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Carapace
abilities.description: Shields the assisted ally for 157 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity Active
abilities.description: You currently have a Monstrosity active

abilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity
abilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

abilities.name: Ultimate Evolution
abilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

abilities.name: Deep Tunnel
abilities.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

abilities.name: General of Hell
abilities.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan's Summons. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Azmodan's Summons. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact. Long range.

abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Mana: 16 per secondChannel a death beam on an enemy dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 200 (+4% per level) damage per second. Does 25% more damage to Structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.

abilities.name: Black Pool
abilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Demonic Invasion
abilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

abilities.name: Rock-It! Turret

abilities.name: Rock-It! Turret

abilities.name: Deth Lazor
abilities.description: Charged attack that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds. Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Robo-Goblin
abilities.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

abilities.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000

abilities.name: Arcane Rift

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Portal

abilities.name: Ley Line Seal

abilities.name: Spawn Egg

If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

abilities.name: Slime
abilities.description: Deal 86 (+4% per level) damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%. Deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

abilities.name: Pufferfish
abilities.description: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 (+5.5% per level) health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Safety Bubble
abilities.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

abilities.name: March of the Murlocs
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Octo-Grab

abilities.name: Voodoo Ritual

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders

abilities.name: Plague of Toads

abilities.name: Gargantuan Stomp

abilities.name: Gargantuan

abilities.name: Worker Rush
abilities.description: Activate to gain an additional 50% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

abilities.name: Artillery

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that deal 96 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deals 141 (+4% per level) damage and pushes enemies away.

abilities.name: Siege Mode

abilities.name: Napalm Strike
abilities.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Gun

abilities.name: Siege Thrusters

abilities.name: Black Arrows
abilities.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures for 1 second.

abilities.name: Withering Fire

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger

abilities.name: Haunting Wave

abilities.name: Wailing Arrow

abilities.name: Mind Control

abilities.name: Viking Hoard
abilities.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

abilities.name: Select Olaf
abilities.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Select Baelog

abilities.name: Select Erik

abilities.name: Select All Vikings

abilities.name: Play Again!
abilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

abilities.name: Longboat Raid!

The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

abilities.name: Go Go Go!

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton

abilities.name: Bone Armor

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes

abilities.name: Bone Prison

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Mages

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage

abilities.name: Hunter Killer

abilities.name: Devouring Maw

abilities.name: Nydus Network

While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive:Creep spreads 15% farther.Passive:While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Bestow Hope
abilities.description: Passive: 40% of the damage you deal to Heroes and 8% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy. Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near you, damage they deal causes you to gain energy. You can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time. You can store up to 505 (+4% per level) energy.

abilities.name: Sacred Sweep
abilities.description: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and an additional 160 (+4% per level) damage to enemies caught in the center

abilities.name: Ray of Heaven
abilities.description: Consume your stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

abilities.name: Detainment Strike
abilities.description: Deal 115 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 115 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Crystal Aegis
abilities.description: Place an allied Hero in Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 270 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Resurrect

abilities.name: Soothing Mist
abilities.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 115 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Deal 274 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and 91 (+4% per level) damage in a larger area.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.description: Target is slowed by 25% Movement Speed, and cannot attack and is Silenced making them unable to use Abilities for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase target's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.

abilities.name: Blink Heal
abilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+4% per level). Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Emerald Wind
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

abilities.name: Iron Fists
abilities.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 125% bonus damage and gives 30% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Radiant Dash
abilities.description: Jump to an ally or enemy. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Breath of Heaven
abilities.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 611 (290 + 4% per level) and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Deadly Reach
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack increases your Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Seven-Sided Strike
abilities.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.81 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

abilities.name: Divine Palm
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 2501 (1187 + 4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Fast Feet
abilities.description: Upon taking damage, gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

abilities.name: Healing Brew
abilities.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) for 204 (+ 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Cloud Serpent
abilities.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on target allied Hero that automatically attacks nearby enemies, doing 25 (+ 4% per level) damage per attack. Heroes can only have 1 Cloud Serpent at a time. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Wind

abilities.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups

abilities.name: Water Dragon

abilities.name: Caduceus Reactor
abilities.description: Regenerate 3.12% of your maximum Health every second after not taking damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Redirect Healing Beam
abilities.description: Redirect Healing Beam to another target. Use on self to cancel channeling.

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 421 (200 + 4% per level) health a second as long as they are in range. Reactivate to switch targets, or activate your Trait to cancel the channel.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target Ally 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage and knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Stim Drone
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Medivac Dropship
