abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: When moving alongside impassable terrain, Lucio can walk through other units, and his Movement Speed is increased by 20%. This works together with other Movement Speed bonuses.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Deal 112 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Play one of two tracks that passively provide allied Heroes with either a Speed Boost or a Healing Boost in a large radius around you. Activate Crossfade to swap tracks.Healing Boost: Passively heal L√∫cio and nearby allied Heroes for 16 health per second.Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of L√∫cio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Raise Lucio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost  to 124 (+4% per level) health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Sound Barrier
abilities.description: After a 1 second delay, grant yourself and all nearby allied Heroes a 1392 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Reverse Amp
abilities.description: Blast L√∫cio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict damage every second, and Speed Boost to Slow Movement Speed by 45%.Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Innervate
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 150 (+4% per level) Health instantly and an additional 536 (+4% per level) Health over 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds, and deals 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Heals 80 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Twilight Dream
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 374 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Ghost Wolf
abilities.description: Instead of using a mount, you transform into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause you to lunge at your target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

abilities.name: Chain Heal
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 334 (+4% per level) Health, then heal up to two other nearby allies for 167 (+4% per level) Health each.

abilities.name: Lightning Shield
abilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthbind Totem
abilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed, and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancestral Healing
abilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 (+4% per level) Health. Cannot be used on yourself.

abilities.name: Bio-Kill Switch
abilities.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 500 health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.Can be cast while channeling Lurking Arm.

abilities.name: Healing Pathogen
abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 240 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds, and a single Healing Pathogen can spread to each allied Hero 1 time.Can cast it on self, and spread to self.Cannot spread to targets to whom it has already spread.

abilities.name: Weighted Pustule
abilities.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 damage upon expiring or being removed.

abilities.name: Lurking Arm
abilities.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that Silences enemies inside and deals 144 damage per second to them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

abilities.name: Massive Shove
abilities.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 200 damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

abilities.name: Flailing Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

abilities.name: Oracle
abilities.description: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds.Passive: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Distortion Beam that slows enemy units by 20%..

abilities.name: Plasma Shield
abilities.description: Grant a Shield that absorbs 475 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. Heroes gain 40% Life Steal from Basic Attacks while Shielded.

abilities.name: Psionic Storm
abilities.description: Deal 84 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 10% for each consecutive instance of damage.

abilities.name: Dimensional Shift
abilities.description: Tassadar becomes invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Archon
abilities.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 166 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

abilities.name: Force Wall
abilities.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Reveal a target enemy and lower their Armor by 25 for 4 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%. Cannot be used on Structures.

abilities.name: Light of Elune
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 270 (+4% per level) Health. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Send an Owl that travels across the battleground revealing its path. Deals 173 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.‚ù¢  Quest: Every 8 Heroes hit by Sentinel decrease its Mana cost by 10 and cause it to pierce an additional target.

abilities.name: Lunar Flare
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 205 (+4% per level) damage and stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadowstalk
abilities.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Starfall
abilities.description: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Eternal Devotion
abilities.description: Heroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself. Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 360 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 180 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Flash of Light
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 242 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 160 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Shield
abilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Storm
abilities.description: Deal 187 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Scarab Host
abilities.description: Using a Basic Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

abilities.name: Harden Carapace
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 315 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Burrow Charge
abilities.description: Burrows to location, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

abilities.name: Locust Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Cocoon
abilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

abilities.name: Shield Overload
abilities.description: If you take damage while below 75% Health, gain a 375 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds. Your Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dash
abilities.description: Dash forward and deal 57 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 (+4% per level) damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Twin Blades
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack immediately causes you to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

abilities.name: Phase Prism
abilities.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes and swaps your position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

abilities.name: Purifier Beam
abilities.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Suppression Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Frostmourne Hungers
abilities.description: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 99 increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

abilities.name: Death Coil
abilities.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage to target enemy. Can be self-cast to heal for 262 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Howling Blast
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Tempest
abilities.description: Mana: 15 per secondDeals 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Slows enemy Move Speed and Attack Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%.

abilities.name: Army of the Dead
abilities.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Summon Sindragosa
abilities.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds. Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Fortifying Brew
abilities.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after you stop drinking.

abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash your keg, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
abilities.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Wandering Keg
abilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ogre Hide
abilities.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

abilities.name: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

abilities.name: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 221 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

abilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
abilities.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds. Passive:Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Essence Collection
abilities.description: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Activate to consume all Essence and heal yourself for 29 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds for each Essence stored. Maximum of 50 Essence. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Lash out with your tongue, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with you for 1.75 seconds. If you are stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 60 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds, and become able to move through units. Deals double damage to Heroes. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Isolation
abilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Adaptation
abilities.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

abilities.name: Brushstalker
abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the battleground.Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone
abilities.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second and take an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 54 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range, they return dealing an additional 81 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Apocalypse
abilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Breath
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech is destroyed, she is ejected after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight in Pilot Mode. Destroying D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP.

abilities.name: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Each Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon death.

abilities.name: Boosters (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Increases D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech by enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals medium to massive damage in a large area, depending on distance from the center of the blast. Deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent using Basic Attacks, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. 45 second cooldown. While in Pilot Mode, each Basic Attack lowers this cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Big Shot
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Deal damage to all enemies in a line. Call Mech's cooldown is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: Rockstar
abilities.description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 20 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

abilities.name: Powerslide
abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

abilities.name: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Guitar Solo
abilities.description: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Stage Dive
abilities.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Armor Up
abilities.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

abilities.name: Groundbreaker
abilities.description: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are pulled toward Garrosh.

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Warlord's Challenge
abilities.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Decimate
abilities.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second. Stores up to 3 charges.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 1344 (638 + 4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, you are Unstoppable.

abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Step forward dealing 248 (118 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: After 1 second, you pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Shield Glare
abilities.description: Deal 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies and cause them to miss Basic Attacks for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Falling Sword
abilities.description: You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds you land, dealing 800 (356 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

abilities.name: Blessed Shield
abilities.description: Deal 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 125 (60 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: Become a ghost when you die, and resurrect upon reaching full Health. Your Abilities and Talents don't do damage while dead, but will still heal you for 50% of their normal amount, causing you to cheat death.

abilities.name: Ghastly Swing
abilities.description: Swing in front of you to slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.description: Swing in front of you to deal 125 (+ 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. Deals double damage to non-Heroes and non-Structures.

abilities.name: Drain Essence
abilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit healing you for up to 12.5% of your maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as you remain close to the enemy. You drain more essence the longer you remain connected.

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing you for up to 20% of your maximum Health while you are nearby, over 4 seconds. You are slowed by 20% while this is active.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: March of the Black King
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 401 (191 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Second Wind
abilities.description: Restore 51 (+4% per level) Health per second when you have not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 102 (+4% per level) Health per second.

abilities.name: Storm Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and stunning it for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Deals 96 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies Movement and Attack Speed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Dwarf Toss
abilities.description: Leap to target location, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

abilities.name: Avatar
abilities.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1124 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Haymaker
abilities.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Passive:Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

abilities.name: Spirit Swoop
abilities.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Charge!
abilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Mend Pet
abilities.description: Heal Misha for 596 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Bestial Wrath
abilities.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Unleash the Boars
abilities.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 441 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
abilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

abilities.name: Vile Gas
abilities.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that poisons nearby enemies for 68 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Hook
abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, temporarily stunning them and dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Deal 104 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Deal 319 (+4% per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of your maximum Health.

abilities.name: Putrid Bile
abilities.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Gorge
abilities.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

abilities.name: Archangel's Wrath
abilities.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: El'Druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 110 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields you for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 135 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 144 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Sanctification
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 10 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 71 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a shield that absorbs 560 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a shield that absorbs 420 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Expulsion Zone
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.
